xml.spreadsheet.style

Class Border

  • java.lang.Object
    • xml.spreadsheet.style.Border

  • public class Border
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a single border within this style's Borders collection. The Borders collection may contain up to six unique Border elements. If duplicate Border elements exist, the behavior is unspecified and the XML Spreadsheet document is considered invalid.
    See Also:
    MSDN Border element reference

      • COLOR_AUTOMATIC

        public static final java.lang.String COLOR_AUTOMATIC
        Automatic value for border color.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.lang.String color)
        Parameters:
        color - Specifies the color of this border. This value can be, among other things, a 6-hexadecimal digit number in "#rrggbb" format. This string can also be the special value of "Automatic." This string is case insensitive.

      • setLineStyle

        public void setLineStyle(Border.LineStyle lineStyle)
        Parameters:
        lineStyle - Specifies the appearance of this border.

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(double weight)
        Parameters:
        weight - Specifies the weight (or thickness) of this border. This measurement is specified in points, and the following values map to:
        0—Hairline
        1—Thin
        2—Medium
        3—Thick

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(Border.BorderWeight weight)
        Parameters:
        weight - Specifies the weight (or thickness) of this border

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
